categories: Category:Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2

nodes.text: Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 50

Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 50 is the fiftieth issue of the Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 published by De Agostini. It came with the parts for the buildable R2-D2's left wheel and a plate for the inside of its dome.
